var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Anonymous 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m impressed, it’s a worthy step up… Reviewed in Canada on October 5, 2025Colour Name: Dark GrayVerified Purchase The media could not be loaded. Very much impressed with the Cosori AF 6QT TurboBlaze air-fryer. This is my second air-fryer; the first, Cosori Air Fryer, is a ProGen 2. It still works great, but I wanted something that could reach higher temperatures as the TurboBlaze model offers and is quieter. var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } proctor1645.0 out of 5 stars It's a quality appliance Reviewed in Canada on October 10, 2024Colour Name: Dark GrayVerified Purchase I've had the previous style with the removable basket for years now...and I'm very happy with the removable basket style, so was nervous to go to this tray version. After a soured experience with another new airfryer major brand/model (2000 series to be nonspecific)...I decided to try this Cosori. I love it! And don't miss the window, which is overrated imho! The Cosori Turboblaze is very premium in design, feel, features, and weight. While you cannot directly set the fan speed...it does have good settings that varies the (DC) fan speed. It's quiet, no vibrations or rattles...and the beeps are very much tolerable and soft sounding. Cooking performance is the same as any similar sized (wattage) air fryer...I don't think there is much difference really...it's a fan with a heating element. The differences do come in with quality of construction, materials, and user interface...all of which affects the price of course. All in all I don't think you can go wrong with this Cosori model...the basket is 9.25 inches square, and the tray looks to be easy to clean (I use a liner anyways). My nit picks on this model would be the lack of a power cord clip...and it doesn't have the built in notches on the bottom for you hands when you pick it up. Otherwise..first rate quality machine! Read more 10 people found this helpful Helpful Report

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Canada5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible 🇨🇦 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Reviewed in Canada on January 9, 2025Colour Name: Dark GrayVerified Purchase I did so much research but the reviews are what sold me on thisMy take:- Its beautiful. I looked at a few at the store and they all looked cheap. This one looks high end, and its not scratchable material.- I was concerned about it being touch, but its so great, works amazing- The basket is not incredibly heavy like majority of the Ninja ones. I wanted it light and it is.- The handle is thick, great for using one hand and the button is great because once I hear a click, I know its secured. So its peace of mind.- I did not wash my unit like it says by accident and it did not stink up the house whatsoever on the first use- This thing is incredibly easy to clean. Takes 2 seconds.- I cook steaks from absolute frozen state, and its incredible. The preheat option is awesome.If you want a rare steak, 385 degrees for 10-12 min each side, and its like getting it at a high end restaurant.Hands down the best airfryer on the market. I will be purchasing another as I know I will be using one for meat and another for veggies or sides.Dont be fooled into getting a dual airfryer. The power is split between them. Get a single one like this.Enjoy! Read more 23 people found this helpful Helpful Report

cosori-turboblaze.description: COSORI TurboBlaze 6.0-Quart Air FryerUpgrade your cooking game with our revolutional Air Fryer, and enjoy faster cooking times, versatile functionality, and exceptional results. With its compact size and large capacity, this is the ultimate kitchen companion for the health concious family. Try it now and transform the way you cook!Specifications:Model: CAF-DC601-KCAPower Supply: DC 120V, 60HzRated Power: 1,725WCapacity: 6 qt /5.7 L (serves 3-5 people)Temperature Range: 90°-450°F/ 30°-230°CTime Range: 1 min-24 hrDimensions: 11.8 x 14.4 x 11.9 in (including handle)Weight: 13.2 lb /6 kgTest Run:In order to make sure the air fryer is working correctly and remove potential odors from the manufacturing process, please follow the instructions in the manual for the Test Run before cooking with your air fryer.

var metricsName = "DesktopCredibleBadgesInTopReviewsDetailPageCount" if(window.ue) { ue.count(metricsName, 0) } Patti RG5.0 out of 5 stars Me gustó muchísimo Reviewed in Mexico on June 6, 2023Verified Purchase Tenía la tentación de adquirir una de estas freidoras porque todo mundo habla de ellas, la verdad no sabía que esperar y ahora que encontré esta a muy buen precio pues me decidí y no me arrepiento. ey4018mx.description: T-fal 4.2L Digital Air Fryer with Touch Screen, Non-Stick, 8 Automatic Programs for Chicken, Pizza Meat, Dishwasher Safe Black EY4018MX - The T-fal Digital Air Fryer has 8 pre-loaded automatic programs for preparing different types of food: fries, chicken, fish, pancake, meat, shrimp, grill, pizza. It has an XL capacity of 4.2 L, timer of 60 minutes, up to 200 °C of temperature and power of 1400 W and 127 V. Features Non-stick technology in the basket. Its design allows for easy cleaning in the dishwasher.

cosori-exclusive.description: Model: CAF-L501-KUS Color: Dark GrayDimensions (L x W x H): 10.8 x 10.9 x 12.1 in / 27.4 x 27.6 x 30.6 cm(without handle); 10.8 x 14.4 x 12.1 in (with handle); basket dimensions: 9.0 x 9.0 x 4.3 in Capacity: 5.0 qt / 4.7 L (serves 2-4 people) Power Supply (US/CA Only): AC 120V, 60Hz Rated Power: 1500W Temperature Range: 170°450°F / 77°230°C Time Range: 160 min Package Contents: 1 x Pro LE 5.0-Quart Air Fryer; 1 x Recipe Book; 1 x User Manual
